names.pharmaceuticalLatin: Radix Patriniae Heterophyllae Radix Patriniae Scabrae

category: Herbs that Clear Heat and Dry Dampness

action.primary: Clears Heat and dries Dampness, stops leukorrhea, prevents malaria and stops bleeding

indications: Malaria, leukorrhea with reddish discharge, metrorrhagia, traumatic injury
